channel.title: Making chill zone for PI
channel.description: Okay so I have been working on a PI but everytime I try to make a chillzone I either get errors or it doesnt work. I have looked at other sources and even tried Voule's command generator. If someone could help that would be great.

item.title: Making chill zone for PI
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:6, topic:458621”][quote author=mr extremez link=topic=561530.msg4096331#msg4096331 date=1346886497]

[code=java]if (playerCommand.equals(“chillzone”) && !c.inWild()) {
String type = c.playerMagicBook == 0 ? “modern” : “ancient”;
c.getPA().startTeleport(3236, 9800, 0, “type”);
}

Although this isn’t much better it is still better than the one posted it checks if you have modern and ancients.[/code]
[/quote]
ur code it giv mi errorz![/quote] messed up the code tag

Read full topic

item.title: Making chill zone for PI
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“mr extremez, post:5, topic:458621”][code=java]if (playerCommand.equals(“chillzone”) && !c.inWild()) {
String type = c.playerMagicBook == 0 ? “modern” : “ancient”;
c.getPA().startTeleport(3236, 9800, 0, “type”);
}

Although this isn’t much better it is still better than the one posted it checks if you have modern and ancients.[/code][/quote]
ur code it giv mi errorz!

item.title: Making chill zone for PI
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

if (playerCommand.equals("chillzone") && !c.inWild()) { String type = c.playerMagicBook == 0 ? "modern" : "ancient"; c.getPA().startTeleport(3236, 9800, 0, "type"); }

Although this isn’t much better it is still better than the one posted it checks if you have modern and ancients.

Read full topic

item.title: Making chill zone for PI
item.dc:creator: @RsMakerWoad RsMakerWoad
item.description:
@RsMakerWoad wrote:

if (playerCommand.equals("chillzone")) { if (c.inWild()) return; c.getPA().startTeleport(3236, 9800, 0, "modern"); }

Btw 3236 9800 is random youll have to find the coords yourself!
As i dont know the coords
